title: Thanator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Death Swap (Night): Choose two players. Any killing abilities that targets one player will be redirected onto the other. You may not use this ability on Unseen players.
- Not It (Night, 1 use): Choose a player. All killing abilities that target an Unseen member will be redirected onto your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will not lose your charge of Not It if you do not redirect a killing ability.
- You are roleblock and redirect immune.

desc:
Post 1081
*Have you ever wanted to be responsible for someone's death without directly killing them? No? Just me?*
